page.title: 15TY MAWR HOLIDAY CENTRE.
page.content: Established in 1946,the Ty Mawr Centre is situated on a former commercial farm.Some of the original buildings have been retained and converted for holiday use.The site covers 50 acres and has permanent caravan sites plus accomodation for touring caravans and tents.Over 50,00 people visit the centre each season,both as permanent and touring holiday makers.The site is owned by the Haven Holidays group which was originally based in Cornwall,but has sites all over Britain and also sites in France.The facilities include restaurant,bars,cafeterias,swimming pool and theatre.The "Old Farmhouse" public house is open to non residents and is the only part of the site which remains open in the winter.
